response.overview: Lucy is a young gallery assistant who collects mementos from her relationships. She discovers that she must let go of her past to move forward, and comes up with a lovely, artistic way to help herself and others who have suffered heartbreak.
response.tagline: There's an art to letting go.
response.title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
